dmca.title: App DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google: Android Market

works.description:
The restaurant nutrition and WW points
within the app noted below are the same information and format as what I
have already published on my website. It appears as if they did a
copy/paste of the table information on the html pages and didn't even
bother to change fonts or colors, so it was easy to spot that this was my
content. The above urls are just a few of the over 200 restaurants that
this app has infringed on my copy right.
